name: property-reference
description: Represents a reference to a property of a BACnet object, optionally including the array index for array properties.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the property being referenced.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: The index within an array property, if applicable. Optional.
